message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  A deal now is better than risking inflation later, don't you think?
Alice, your offer was a bit too greedy for my liking. I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you 45. Take it now, it's only going downhill from here, especially for you.
Bob, let's be realistic.  This is my last chance for a decent offer. 55/45 is the best you'll get. After this round, the money will be practically worthless for me.
